attributes.name: confirm
attributes.description: Optionally add a confirmation dialog before firing the action.

attributes.name: confirm-message
attributes.description: The text of the confirmation message;

attributes.name: confirm-no-text
attributes.description: The text of the no button for confirmation.

attributes.name: confirm-yes-text
attributes.description: The text of the yes button for confirmation.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button

attributes.name: reversed
attributes.description: Optionally reverses the button style.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Optionally sets the button size, small normal or large, defaults to normal

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Optional button style,
can be either primary, secondary or tertiary and defaults to primary if not specified

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Defines if the checkbox is checked (true) or unchecked (false) or in an intermediate state (undefined)

attributes.name: use-intermediate
attributes.description: Defines if clicking the checkbox will go through the intermediate state between checked and unchecked (tri-state)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value for this checkbox (not to be confused with its checked state).

attributes.name: collapse-text
attributes.description: Collapse text for screen readers

attributes.name: expand-text
attributes.description: Expand text for screen readers

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Is the chevron expanded

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Defines if the panel is expanded or not.

attributes.name: transition-duration
attributes.description: Defines the transition time in ms, defaults to 150ms

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the initial color, must be a valid 8 character hexadecimal string without the # sign.

attributes.name: color-box-height
attributes.description: Sets the width-height ratio of the color picker saturation-lightness box.

attributes.name: allow-camera-mode
attributes.description:
If true, will allow the user to take a snapshot
using the device camera. (only works over https).

attributes.name: capture-quality
attributes.description:
Specifies the jpeg quality for when the device
camera is used to generate a picture.
Needs to be a number between 0 and 1 and defaults to 0.8

attributes.name: max-file-size
attributes.description: Max file size in bytes.

description.value:
Allows cropping an image in-browser with the option to enforce a specific final size.
All computation happens in the browser and the final image is emmited
in an event that has a data-url of the image.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Sets the desired final image height.

attributes.name: prevent-undersized
attributes.description: When set to true, prevents cropping an image smaller than the required size, which would blow pixel and make the final picture look blurry.

attributes.name: quality
attributes.description: Sets the output quality of the cropped image (number between 0 and 1).

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Sets the desired final image width.

attributes.name: backdrop-dismiss
attributes.description: Pass false to remove the backdrop click auto-dismiss feature.

attributes.name: close-text
attributes.description:
Optionally pass the aria-label text for the close button.
Defaults to "Close modal" if not provided.

attributes.name: resizable
attributes.description: If set to true, the modal becomes resizable.

attributes.name: show-close-button
attributes.description:
Optionally you can pass false to not show the close button.
If you decide to do so, you should either not also prevent dismissal by clicking the backdrop
or provide your own dismissal logic in the modal content.

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Reflects the visible state of the modal.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Defines the language for the editor.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Sets the code contained in the editor

attributes.name: debounced
attributes.description: Debounces the queryChanged by 500ms.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the field placeholder text.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Sets the query

attributes.name: sort-direction
attributes.description: Defines the current sort direction

description.value: Represents a single tab and must be used inside a dnn-tabs element.

attributes.name: tab-title
attributes.description: Defines the tab title.

description.value: `dnn-tabs` is a container for `dnn-tab` and should only contain `dnn-tab` elements for its content.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: If 'true' the toggle is checked (on).

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If 'true' the toggle is not be interacted with.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: Defines if the current node is expanded.

description.value: A component that shows a vertical list of items as they fit. When they don't all fit, it puts the ones that don't fit into a dropdown menu.

This allows splitting a UI into vertical adjustable panels, the splitter itself is not part of this component.
- The content for the left part should be injected in the `left` slot.
- The content for the right part should be injected in the `right` slot.
- The content for the actual splitter should go in the default slot and other UI elements can be injected as long as you handle their behaviour, by default only the drag behavior is implemented in the component.

attributes.name: split-width-percentage
attributes.description: The percentage position of the splitter in the container.

attributes.name: splitter-width
attributes.description: The width of the splitter area.
